title: CME Raises Gold, Silver Margins After Historic Price Plunge
description: CME Group is raising margins on Comex gold and silver futures after prices suffered their biggest slides in decades.
content: CME Group is raising margins on Comex gold and silver futures after prices suffered their biggest slides in decades.
